enabled.description: Set to true to enable automatic script generation on build

baseUrl.description: The base URL for generating MVC actions for this project.  Generally used when this project is a sub-application of another project.

serverObjectsResultFilepath.description: The default relative output path for any class marked with 'ScriptObject'.  This can be overridden with the 'ScriptObjects' attribute.

nameCasingConverter.description: Defines the casing strategy to use by default for properties and actions.  In all cases, a specified property (i.e. JsonPropertyNameAttribute) name will always take precidence.

fetchConfig.description: The configuration for your generalized fetch function

useAlias.description: Set to true to use an alias for this import.  Which, like, doesn't matter.

items.description: The items to import from the provided path

path.description: The relative path of the file to import from.

name.description: The name of method that will perform this fetch

filePath.description: The relative path from the project root of the file that contains the fetch function

returnType.description: The return type for the fetch function.  Can use the token $returnType$ to use the return type of the action. Example: Promise<$returnType$>

type.description: The type of the parameter.  Can use tokens such as $returnType$

optional.description: Set to true to make this an optional parameter.
